entry.title: $1995 // ***AWESOME LUDLOW STREET 1 BED DIGS***AMAZING LOCATION!!!
entry.content:
AVAILABLE NOW!

*** BRAND NEW EVERYTHING! ***

Just Up 1 flight of stairs - NEWLY GUT-RENOVATED 2 room studio/Jr 1 bedroom in Prime LES!
The kitchenette is open to the living space and features brand new Black granite countertops, glossy white cabinets, and a brand new stainless steel refrigerator and gas stove/oven will be installed. The bedroom has a window and will best accommodate a twin/ full bed.
Please Note: The toilet is on one side of the bedroom and the bathtub/ shower is separate, just off the living space.

Brand new hardwood floors throughout.

Tenant is responsible for all Utilities. (Electricity, hot water, cooking gas)

Available for Immediate/January 15th lease start date. Guarantors OK. (Must be in US and Well-qualified)
Broker Fee Applies.

EMAIL TODAY WHILE THIS LASTS!
